entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Official build failure trying to sign Microsoft.NET.Sdk.WebAssembly.Pack #84742
  • SYSLIB1051: Runtime Marshalling must be disabled only shows up in command line builds, not in Visual Studio #84739
  • Debugger.IsAttached doesn't work #84736
  • Should Roslyn emit constrained calls rather than boxing for explicit interface calls on structs? #84729
  • Ability to set and extract request metadata for outgoing http requests #84728
    8.0.0
  • [7.0] WASM Linux failure in DllImportSearchPathsTest: parameter 'path1' value is null #84724
  • Cmdline arguments are not parsed correctly using System.Environment.CommandLine #84723
  • [wasm] WasmBuildTests NativeBuild_WithDeployOnBuild_UsedByVS is disabled #84722
    8.0.0
  • System.Numerics.BigInteger performance of operators `+`, `-` and `*` can be improved when both arguments are trivial #84721
  • [7.0] coreclr Linux musl arm assert failure: `obj->GetGCSafeMethodTable()->HasFinalizer()` in syncblk.cpp #84719
  • Degraded performance in metering when creating a lot of instruments #84713
  • HttpClient is eating useful exception information #84712
    8.0.0
  • Re-enable PGO optimization for linux #84711
  • superpmi: DeprecationWarning running superpmi.py #84710
    8.0.0
  • Memory Leak in MulticastDelegate #84709
  • [wasi] Unable to install `wasi-experimental` workload #84707
  • JSON Serialize as object doesn't work with source generation by default #84704
    8.0.0
  • Unexpected behavior (InvalidOperationException) with [JsonRequired] property set through constructor #84702
  • Enable EventPipe test for NativeAOT #84701
    8.0.0
  • Movo mono llvmaot test build away from binutils #84700
    8.0.0
  • Include ADO azure-feed:// URI for daily build feeds in dogfooding docs #84699
  • Loop condition `i != T.Length` bounds check not eliminated #84697
    Future
  • [JitStress] VectorTableLookupExtension fails in jitstress1 #84696
    8.0.0
  • [Fuzzlyn] x86 assertion in stublinker #84694
  • [Fuzzlyn] Arm64 failure for negation, cast, bitwise-and #84693
    8.0.0
  • .NET 8 CLI console output uses UTF-8 feature is incomplete #84691
  • Why is the performance of HttpClient low? #84672
  • IBinaryInteger<BigInteger>.GetShortestBitLength() - int overflow is not handled #84670

Closed

  • Annotate System.Security.Cryptography.Xml for trimming #73432
    8.0.0
  • Unused struct fields sometimes improve the codegen #79928
    8.0.0
  • System.Reflection.NullabilityInfoContext does not correctly determine nullability of members in constructed generics #84647
  • Implement proper parsing of primitives in config binder generator #83533
    8.0.0
  • Make the return type of JsonSerializerOptions.GetTypeInfo nullable. #81269
    8.0.0
  • Unnecessary Trim analysis warnings for internal static fields of a RequiresUnreferencedCode class #81864
  • UdpClient inconsistent behaviour between Windows and Linux. #83525
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Add Support for ToBase In BigInteger Parsing #84684
  • Some test projects fail to restore under /p:DotNetBuildFromSource=true #84617
  • Issue with implementation of some methods in `Unsafe` (alignment) #84678
  • Facing errors while mocking Get() in ManagementObjectSearcher #84513

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT: extend initial profile repair to more cases #84741
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-staging] Caching settings.pause_mode to avoid deadlock #84738
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Address misc feedback for config binder implementation #84737
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Skip DllImportSearchPathsTest on wasm #84735
    needs-area-label
  • Avoid clearing mark array when it was not committed #84734
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Improve BigInteger operators +, - and * for trivial cases #84733
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Always set `GTF_GLOB_REF` on block indirs #84731
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Try building LLVM AOT tests with llvm prefix #84730
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Try centos stream 8 for mono llvmaot build #84727
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/6.0] Disable 2 failing tests for 6.0 #84726
    area-System.Net.Http
  • fix: Ensure that JSImport/JSExport use fully qualified name for DebuggerNonUserCode #84725
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, community-contribution
  • Fix source-build oob package orchestration #84720
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Always include the original exception in HttpClient #84717
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • [JIT] ARM32/ARM64 - Fixed zero/sign-extension for `GT_STORE_LCL_VAR` in codegen #84716
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Investigating failures #84715
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [workloads][wasi] Add wasi to the workloads build #84714
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` support interning #84695
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Handle not compatible parameters to IndexOf #84692
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Generate SslConnectionInfo.Unix.cs with T4 template #84690
    area-System.Net.Security, size-reduction, community-contribution
  • feat(83547): Adding escaping of property name for GetPath. #84688
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • [wasm] PackedSimd, add extending integer arithmetic #84687
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Disable component governance for internal JIT pipelines #84683
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Port perfmap environment variable change to 6.0 #84681
    Servicing-consider, area-Tracing-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • [Release/6.0] Port EventCounters multi session support to 6.0 #84680
    Servicing-consider, area-Tracing-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • [Release/7.0] Port EventCounters multi session support to 7.0 #84679
    Servicing-consider, area-Tracing-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • Build on mariner with llvm 16 #84676
    needs-area-label

Merged

  • [release/6.0] Fix null being passed to g_path_get_dirname when probing in wasm #84740
    Servicing-approved, area-AssemblyLoader-mono, 6.0.x
  • Build on CBL-mariner host with rootfs #84148
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Reduce test projects and remove usage of Newtonsoft.Json in StartupHook tests #84652
    area-Host
  • [mono][inline] Allow inlining methods containing ctor calls if they h… #84660
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Resolve ILLink warnings in System.Security.Cryptography.Xml #84468
    area-System.Security
  • [fabricbot] Remove PRs from project board when moved or excluded #84718
    area-Meta, 8.0.0
  • Allow promotion of structs with single float fields #84627
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Add an in-release flag to enable physical promotion #84689
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • update snapcraft.yaml for .NET #84706
    area-Setup
  • [browser] Wasm SDK packed as a nuget package #84082
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Implement proper parsing for primitives in config binding gen #84154
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Add a `JsonSerializerOptions.TryGetTypeInfo` method. #84411
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [mono][llvm] Avoid making volatile loads/stores to variables marked I… #84674
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Avoid warnings due to RUC on type when marking assembly as library #84620
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • Don't use AVX-512 for small inputs in Memmove due to throttle issues #84577
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use cinc instead of csel when possible #82031
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][aot] Make the names of some of the aotconst variables more des… #84673
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Annotate XslCompiledTransform as RequiresDynamicCode. #84426
    area-System.Xml
  • Tell coverlet to respect the [DoesNotReturn] attribute for coverage purposes #84396
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [RISC-V][JIT] Fix assert on passing double in struct #84584
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Mono] Enable the supported V128 SIMD intrinsics on Arm64 across all codegen engines #84289
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Clear .NET Framework target while building tests with DotNetBuildFromSource. #84682
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Use maxSIMDStructBytes when determining largest promotable struct size #84623
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2156353 #84669
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • SPMI: Add possibility to specify custom options in diffs pipeline #84645
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete serialization support from the managed type system #84675
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Baseline failing Pri0 tests under interop/loader #84614
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Fix for test build break in the outerloop pipeline #84649
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Revert "Mark tasks projects as non-source projects" #84671
    needs-area-label
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` not supported on WASI #84629
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Validate constraints on created MethodTables #84613
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][jit] Intrinsify more calls to Type:op_Equality (). #84653
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #84610
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm-mt] A version of LowLevelLifoSemaphore that uses callbacks on the browser #84491
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono
  • Zlib: Add some protections to the allocator used by zlib #84604
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Change `callvirt` into `calli` for virtual delegates #83461
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Expose setting CPU SamplingProfiler rate #83635
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • AssemblyBuilder.Save add custom attributes handling. #84580
    area-System.Reflection, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [NativeAOT] Simplifying access to thread static variables #84566
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • More efficient executable allocator #83632
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Zlib: Update zlib to v1.2.13, intel-zlib to v1.2.13_jtk #84602
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Fix type initialization ordering under R2R #84275
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Upgrade arm64 cross image to Ubuntu 22.04 / llvm-15 #83939
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Implement IUtf8SpanFormattable on all the numeric types in corelib #84587
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add TextWriter.FlushAsync(CancellationToken) #84325
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Fix handling of load for msquic and search paths for nativeaot and mono #84663
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Split PortableThreadPool.WorkerThread start and loop body #84490
    area-System.Threading
  • Switch mono to use cmake-detected objcopy #83903
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • Run NativeAot tests on arm64 #82307
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Pooled async value task for HTTP 1 connection #81426
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Make tasks default to Release in CI/official builds and Debug in local builds #84666
    area-Infrastructure
  • Simplify some importer code #84656
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable Libraries R2R Testing in CI #83854
    area-Infrastructure
  • Initial work to enable native events in EventPipe #84318
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Implement `load_assembly_bytes` delegate for hosting API #84650
    area-Host
  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #84611
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add status code and exception info to System.Net.Http events #84036
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Optimize GDV checks for objects with known type #84661
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Support building a mono-based .NET Runtime on x64 #68424
    area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution
  • SHA3 #84132
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono][tasks] Extract EmitWasmBundle into generic EmitBundle task and enable bundling in mono self-contained library #84191
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [OSX] HybridGlobalization implement locale native functions #84417
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios, os-tvos, os-maccatalyst
  • Allow certificate bundles for AIA fetching #83389
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Security
  • Assist JIT in eliminating bounds checks #81036
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • [mono][aot] Enable deduplication of runtime invoke wrappers #84304
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-ios, size-reduction, 8.0.0
  • [browser] Minimal blazor.boot.json integration #84296
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` indexing #84471
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • [mono][jit] Adding support for Vector128::ExtractMostSignificantBits intrinsic on ARM64 with miniJIT #84345
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Add config binder generator to ASP.NET Core transport pack #84436
    NO-MERGE, area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • [mono] add internal WebWorkerEventLoop utility class #84492
    arch-wasm, area-Threading-mono
  • JIT: Seed stress modes by string hash #83771
    blocked, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] coreclr-pal and coreclr-debug directories #82380
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` SortKey #84621
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Consider numeric string json for EnumConverter. #79432
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Add HttpClient.Shared #84327
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Clone files on OSX-like platforms when possible, instead of copying the whole file #79243
    area-System.IO, os-mac-os-x, community-contribution
  • Set better DfsBlockEntry stack initial capacity #84186
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable flaky test until find better fix #84651
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Fix running tests against our DNNE'd NativeExports project to work in NativeAOT #84578
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
